    • beginConstructor

      protected void beginConstructor(String descriptor)
      Starts the code for a public constructor and initializes the MethodVisitor.
      Parameters:
      descriptor - the parameter signature of the constructor (e.g. "(Ljava/lang/String;I)V" if the constructor takes a String and an int)

    • callBaseClassConstructor

      protected void callBaseClassConstructor(String descriptor)
      Invokes the base class constructor. The MethodVisitor must be initialized for the constructor of the class being generated.
      Parameters:
      descriptor - the parameter signature of the base-class constructor

    • loadIntConstant

      public void loadIntConstant(int value)
      Writes an instruction to push an integer constant onto the operand stack. Depending on the magnitude of the value, writes ICONST_n, BIPUSH, SIPUSH or LDC.
      Parameters:
      value - the integer constant
